content: needles cast on loosely 64 s m or 72 l xl sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist your stitches place marker round 1 *k2 p2* to the end of the round repeat round 1 until the desired length is reached about 8 / 20 cm for a fitted beanie about 10 5 / 27 cm for a slouchy beanie decrease change to dpns if needed round 1 *k2 p2tog * to the end of the round you should have 48 54 sts round 2 *k2 p1 * to the end of the round round 3 *k2 p1 * to the end of the round round 4 *k2tog k1 yes knit * to the end of the round you should have 32 36 sts round 5 *k2tog* to the end of the round you should have 16 18 sts cut yarn leaving an 8 tail and using a tapestry needle weave yarn through the remaining stitches to close up the hat festival beanie © kristel nieves @kristelnc - 2026 3 i hope you enjoyed making this hat as much as i did i d love to see your project if you d like you can use the hashtag #festivalbeanie on instagram feel free to sell finished hats made using this pattern but please do not copy share or sell the pattern festival beanie © kristel nieves @kristelnc - 2026 4
